product_name: The North Face Komper Insulated Jacket - Women's
long_description: Light and warm, the Komper Insulated jacket from The North Face offers highly weather-resistant protection and cozy synthetic insulation to ensure your comfort on cold, snowy days on the mountain. TNF(TM) Apex ClimateBlock soft-shell fabric is windproof, breathable and highly water-resistant; 4-way stretch offer unrestricted movement. Heatseeker(TM) polyester insulation keeps you warm without inhibiting movement. Fully adjustable, removable helmet-compatible hood ensures a weather-blocking, personalized fit. Zip chest pocket; zip handwarmer pockets; wrist accessory pocket with goggles cloth; internal media pocket; internal goggles pocket. Powder skirt on the Komper insulated jacket has gripping elastic to keep snow out. Cinch adjustable hem and rip-and-stick wrist cuffs help seal out cold air and retain valuable warmth; core vents let you control airflow and your comfort.
short_description: Light and warm, the Komper Insulated jacket from The North Face offers highly weather-resistant protection and cozy synthetic insulation to ensure your comfort on cold, snowy days on the mountain.
